item.title: Jason Momoa Confirmed For His Dream DC Universe Recasting 1 Year After Aquaman's End, Sets Supergirl Debut In 2026
item.description: Jason Momoa may finally be returning to the realm of DC after confirming talks are taking place for his dream recasting after his stint as Aquaman.

item.title: "Almost Erotic Pleasure In How I Can Control You": Ralph Fiennes Reflects On Portraying Voldemort's Lack Of Empathy In Harry Potter Movies
item.description: Ralph Fiennes breaks down the mindset he needed to adopt in order to effectively play the villainous Voldemort in the Harry Potter movies.

item.title: Family Horror Movie With A Festive Spin Find Streaming Success 40 Years Later
item.description: A family holiday horror movie from the 1980s has now become a streaming hit four full decades after the film was initially released in theaters.
